website_summaries.verdict: These cushioned corner guards come pre-fitted with 3M tape, making application as easy as one, two, three.
pros: Hassle-free design allows users to simply open the package, remove tape backing, and apply
Made of substantial, impact absorbing foam
Free of nasty chemicals, heavy metals, and latex
Adheres well to clean, smooth surfaces
Available in multiple colors and package sizes
cons: Determined toddlers might be able to pull these off

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky enough
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were very useful until I see my 10mo baby can completely remove it with his hand and chew on it..
customer_reviews.author: özlem

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable, easy to pull off of furniture
customer_reviews.text: These corner guards are easy to use and install, but aren't super durable. My son (13 months old) has figured out how to pull them off of furniture, and he has begun biting them. They're a very soft material, and I'm worried that he'll bite a chunk off soon, which will be a choking hazard. I suggest buying a product that is made of a more durable material.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic knee saver!
customer_reviews.text: The way our bed is positioned in our bedroom, a wooden corner juts out right in to the walking path. Every few months I ram my knee in to it and vow to throw out the bed frame. I bought these one night right after running my knee in to the bed again. The color is a good match for dark wood and you wouldn't see them there unless you know to look for them. I have yet to hit my knee in to them, but with how thick and strong they are, I imagine my bruises and cuts will be a thing of the past! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Such a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these one month ago to put on the corners of our coffee tables because our child fell into the corner and had to have stitches! It only took one fall for me to search these babies while sitting in the ER waiting room! Wish I would have had them before
customer_reviews.author: Summer_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not just for children.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these, not because we have small children, but because as seniors, we don't want to fall on sharp corners. These are perfect for those sharp edges that could cause massive injury if one were to hit them. Thank you for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: These could work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my 2 year old's head as he's bumped it enough that his chances of being surgeon are nil. I like this protect and it would work IF they were more difficult to remove. Unfortunately my little guy loves pulling these off and considers it a form of entertainment apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby proofing!
customer_reviews.text: Great for baby proofing! We used these on our baseboard corners. I slightly cut the foam so it could fit snugly on the baseboard corners ((see photos)). These are SO MUCH SOFTER than the clear silicone corner protectors. These are actually made of soft foam and will protect your baby from getting seriously injured. Only CON: they are not true white. They are more of a light gray/beige. It’s kind of misleading that it’s labeled white.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F.

customer_reviews.title: Great bumpers!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, they really stick to surfaces better than the other brands I have tried. I did notice on our glass coffee table if they get wet the adhesive comes right off (i.e., a spilled glass of water in my case) and the bumper no longer sticks. So be sure to keep them dry (which shouldn't be a problem). Oh, and because they stick so well - make sure you put them on evenly on the first try!
customer_reviews.author: kat1eb00

customer_reviews.title: Decent balance between protection and aesthetics
customer_reviews.text: Descent edge guards. They are a decent balance over the really large bulbous corner guards and the corners natural edge. See my image for the comparison. We like these much better (left) I used denatured alcohol to clean glass surface prior to application. Most have stayed on for about 2 years. One or two occasionally fall off and we just stick them back on.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon N.

customer_reviews.title: Protects those noggins!
customer_reviews.text: These work out very well. A few bumps of heads have hit these with no tears. Phew! They adhere and stay stuck which is nice. They do leave a bit of sticky residue when removed, which took a bit of work (but I think that is preferred than to them just falling off). The only downside I'm noticing is that a few of them (I bought the brown ones) are starting to discolor, turning a tint of green. This is perhaps due to facing our back door with some sun exposure. Not a huge deal as they still function but if you really look at them they are not all brown any longer.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Meets the need
customer_reviews.text: Your Amazon Article Analyst here providing another real review... I needed something to cover a few sharp over-head corners. These corner guards worked perfectly for my need. I placed them directly on wood trim and the double-sided tape feels very solid. I will update my review later if they don't end up sticking as some reviewers have reported, but I don't expect to have a problem based on how they feel after installed.
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sharp IKEA furniture
customer_reviews.text: Listen, I can’t tell you how many times I’ve somehow managed to run into the sides of my bed. This thing is easy to install and seems sturdy & it feels really squishy. And you can’t see it once the blankets and comforters are draped over the bed (I got a size small for reference)
customer_reviews.author: Sapirtheangel

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for an adult-only home
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any children at home but I bought these for the edges of my bed frame. The corners are very sharp and this was meant to cushion. These did NOT work for us. Bear in mind that we don't have children, our home is 2 adults yet somehow the guards were not able to stay on with minimal disturbance. I had problems with them falling off within 3 days. Besides not being sticky enough, they have provided very little cushion. I will not be purchasing this again and if I were you, I'd go with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra B

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. We have bought a lot of different corner protectors for my toddler. What I love is that the adhesive strip is already applied to the pieces, so that wasn't an extra step I had to take. Also, these have more cushion, so if my toddler hits the corner, it softer impact than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: So far So great!!
customer_reviews.text: So far So great !!! only have them for a short time, I am pleased with the amount of cushioning; we have 6 great granddaughters between the ages of 2 yrs to 8 yrs and a granddaughter​ age 6; when they are at all our home at the same time it is like a nursery school and they can really get "moving"; so I am sure we will be glad we have them in place' ; seem to be very well made. Thanks, Amazon for researching for great products !!!
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: fantastic and great looking - but useless.
customer_reviews.text: I love these corners. They are super easy to install, look sleek and especially on my black table aren't overly noticeable and sharp corners are quickly turned into a much less dangerous part of the house. But even after a 48h touch free adhesing period, my itty bitty one year old pulled every last one of them off without any difficulties what.so.ever. Money wasted, corners still a dangerzone.
customer_reviews.author: G. Young

customer_reviews.title: Do not stay on!
customer_reviews.text: These are disappointing. They fall off way too easily. I bought them to put on our coffee table and computer desks to protect our young dogs who run around and bump into them when playing. But these just fall off from the slightest bump. And then the dogs pick them up and chew them! I press on them daily to try to secure them, but it still doesn't take much to knock them off. Pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Crista S. Forest

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: These get the job done and give protection against those sharp edges both for kids and adults. The stick is pretty good. Note for parents - Although these are marketed as protection for kids, kids are going to pull, scratch and chew on these and eventually damage the product. This is a short term alternative. Long term you should invest in furniture without sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: psoftconsult

customer_reviews.title: It works! My child's head is safer now.
customer_reviews.text: We have an island with hard top in our kitchen. My daughter keeps bumping her head at the island's corners when she run around. This product resolved this issue and there is no more crying after accidental head contact with the island corners. I had concerns if the protectors stay firm on the island's corners because the island top's bottom is hollow. Therefore the protector adhesive part touches only two sides but not the bottom. And it turned out to be fine as long as you avoid messing with the protector. It has been attached to that corner for 3 months without problems.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Great for covering sharp corners
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my sons scratched themselves multiple times on the corners of the ladders on their new bunk bed. They were easy to put on and worked really well to cover up those sharp corners. Only one has fallen off so far after a couple months of use. I would buy these again and also recommend them. I ordered both the extra large and the large to see which size would work best and I kept the extra large. The size difference between the 2 was actually surprising because the large looked way smaller than the extra large. They worked out well and I'm happy that I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: These are the best corner protectors I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are the best corner protectors I have ever used! They are the perfect size and although I just bought them, I don’t see them falling off! Seriously the quality and quantity for the price is amazing! This is the third time I bought these and it's only because I have that many corners to cover. Most of our house is wood or in that color family - so not only are they functionally amazing but they look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to obviously put on the corners of counters and desks. I live in a small bedroom and bump into edges often. I installed two on the back corners of my cat tree as well, since when my 14 pound cat jumps into it, he causes it to bump loudly into the wall. This eliminated the loud THUMP when he jumps. I also installed two of these on the edges of my brothers bedframe. You know the bedframe I'm talking about. The one where if you bump your foot against it it'll cut you wide open. Problem solved! TLDR; Great, functional item, not just for table corners.
customer_reviews.author: Marriann

customer_reviews.title: It’s a yes for me !
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I read the reviews some were horrible reviews some were great. I risked it just bc my son has bang up his head so many times on our stainless steel island. I was very skeptical but honestly its work out great for us. I’m not sure if it’s bc it’s stainless steal the grip was really amazing vs regular counter tops .... however I did read that kids can easily take off but not in my case again I don’t know if it’s bc it’s stainless steal, my son tried taking it off multiple times since he saw us installing it it was impossible for him to take off ... I hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Barragan

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and functional
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly impressed, the 3M sticker are really good. Only thing, it is a little tricky to get it into position as the adhesive on one side prevents the other side to sit firmly. But once you get a hang of it, its easy. Don't think this is coming out as some people pointed out. I hit it with my leg and it just stays. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The-Gov

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new bed and metal base standing 18" high off the floor. I love that aspect of the base because it allows for storage of items under the bed that the old mattress and box springs did not. But the base is AS wide and long as the mattress and is made of steel. The first night I gouged a shin through my pants. These are essential because of the 4 corners left up in the air just below my knees.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend (and I’m a picky buyer:) )
customer_reviews.text: Excellent corners! Holding up very well. We bought other corners before these from Lowe’s and they all fell down. These corners are excellent and holding up well. I highly recommend these for anyone with active toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska88

customer_reviews.title: Great corner protectors
customer_reviews.text: These bumpers are fantastic! I purchased a large coffee table that has killer corners. Not only did the humans in the household manage to ram into the corners, but also the family dog. I purchased these mainly to protect the dog as he was at eye level to the corners. The dark brown matches perfectly with the finish of my table. In fact, they aren’t noticeable at first glance. I’m very happy with this purchase and hope to one day be able to remove them when we get used to having this table in our space.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great to protect the noggin from a solar panel
customer_reviews.text: We used this product to protect the humans from getting damaged on the sharp corners of our solar panels on our sailboat. I had this image of rough seas and slamming a forehead into it. These are the right answer. Adhesive is solid and they seem well constructed. sv Breeze
customer_reviews.author: Shaun O.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cushiony!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on one of my end tables that have sharp corners. They are easy to apply to the table and are very cushiony. I haven't removed them yet so cannot comment on that part, but would absolutely buy them again. My granddaughter saw them and was curious but after the initial touch and feel she hasn't bothered them again. If you are pondering between these and other corner protectors you won't be disappointed with these.
customer_reviews.author: betty b

customer_reviews.title: Better then most and smaller.
customer_reviews.text: These corners seem better made than the average offering on Amazon. The glue works well and they stay on longer. These corners are about half the size of the typical offering and i like them better for that reason. I think they offer the same level of protection as the larger units.
customer_reviews.author: E!

customer_reviews.title: Good corners as baby safety tool!
customer_reviews.text: Great corners, just as described. I ordered a different color elsewhere with few line protective strips, ran out of corners & this was a good replacement. Though color differ from what I have, white version is very close to beige which I originally setup. The material is nice and soft and baby safe. My son (13months) would occasionally stop by the table and take a bite, but surprisingly there are no teeth marks or bitten pieces. Good stuff, recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vladlena Malikova

customer_reviews.title: Best cushion and adhesive!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these exactly a year ago. Best corner guards around. We used these for our sharp window ledge and furniture corners and they’ve saved our twins from painful gashes and bruises so many times! Adherence is incredible. We always cleaned surfaces with alcohol prior to applying to make sure they stay. Might take the first couple to get used to the best angle and approach to apply (You get one shot). The adhesive is that good.
customer_reviews.author: I Read Too Many Reviews B4 Buying

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults to prevent hitting their heads!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to put on the corners of our stove hood to protect us from hitting our heads on the corners--which are just at forehead level. They work great for that. So far, so good. Very easy to install. the adhesive didn't adhere at first, but I just hadn't pressed it hard enough against the stainless surface.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne H.

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok but ..
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep my 18 month old from bumping her head on the corners of our dining table and a small patio table that we have. It gets the job done , but I wish the inner grove that adheres to the corners was wider. The little girl has already figured how to remove a few of them ( which I promptly replaced). The good thing is that she often overlooks them due to them blending in so well with the Color of the furniture that they’re being used on. They were easy to install, but as for the durability only time will tell. They’re not perfect but they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: KAA

customer_reviews.title: Should have a warning label. "Will ruin furniture"
customer_reviews.text: This item sticks TOO well or not enough? We bought these because our daughter just started walking along furniture and we also just purchased a new coffee table. I bumped the corner one day and the whole cushion piece came off ALONG WITH A CHUNK OF OUR TABLE! I'm furious knowing we won't even be able to peel this CRAP off of our coffee table without taking off a layer or 3 of the table
customer_reviews.author: Lynn W.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection without looking tacky
customer_reviews.text: We've had these on a couple weeks now. They are holding up really well (some reviewers had issues with them falling off?). The instructions say to press them down once a week to help keep them on with changes in moisture, etc. They have a great level of cushion to protect the little one's head from bumping table corners and such, but they also don't look tacky or anything. Great product, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I understand these are used when children are young, but I used them on sharp corners of countertops due to my husband's illness in which he had fainting spells. Now that his health has improved, I found that they are easy enough for me to remove, and the adhesive is easily removed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be awesome to have especially with children playing in the house. You just never know what my happen so this should eliminate the possibility of someone hit the sharp conner of something. Very pleased. They have been in place for months now and seem to be staying on very good.
customer_reviews.author: Chewy

customer_reviews.title: Works great for cats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep the cat from chewing the edges of my furniture. Yes you read that right. Anyway it did work she just kind of rubbed up against them, but when I removed one because I wanted to paint the dresser, some of the sticky remained on the furniture. It's no problem. It was unfinished anyway. Had it been on a painted surface im sure it would have been fine. But they work as they should I'm assuming. Update the sticky residue just rubbed off fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works for our grill
customer_reviews.text: We use these on the corners of our outdoor grill shelves. Our cover was getting torn up from the sharp aluminum corners on our grill shelves on each side, so i put these on both upper and lower corners and they have kept out replacement cover from tearing so far. Its been a couple of months with some pretty large summer storms, and no sign of wear or punctures. They are tough to cut but can be done to size down if needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Simonds

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These in my opinion are a must have when you have children in the house lol I have 2 young boys and they can be wild at times. My youngest has a metal bed with pretty pointy corners and I placed them on all the corners, they have held up well. I only have had to replace 1 and that was because he kept picking at it. I have some left tucked aside for when I need to replace another. Good quality and value!
customer_reviews.author: Levi Felts

customer_reviews.title: Baby proofing made easy
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our tall dresser. When carrying our newborn around and walking with him in our room to get him to fall asleep his head was level where the dresser corners would be. So we got pads. They were installed in about 10 seconds and are soft to the touch. We have extras to use around the house. Will definitely get more once baby is more mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: I hate it when the delivered product does not match the ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate it when the delivered product does not match the pictures on Amazon. The pictures for the LARGE corner guard show a seamless molded product with rounded corners and NO joints, which is aesthetically pleasing. The delivered product has spliced joints and a sharper outer corner than pictured; it's definitely less pleasing to the eye than what's shown on Amazon. Other than that, the corner guards are functional and provide good protection. The foam density is just right and the adhesive seems adequate so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cushions no match for 1 year old boys
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to use and I was able to adhere the cushions to a variety of furnished with different thickness and corner shapes, however, my boys were just too curious about them and peeled them off each time. I will say that they remained sticky even after being removed, and had they been stickier, it may have damaged the furniture, still... didn't do the job for me. Again, wasn't because it didn't do what our was supposed to. It was just too easily removed by my 1 year olds. Nice cushion to them as well, definitely protects corners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my arms
customer_reviews.text: The corners of my kitchen island have left bleeding scratches on my arms. These have made it so I no longer have to fear my fast moving gibbon arms slamming into sharp corners. Removing the backing wasnt ideal and placement had to be done with confidence but the hold is firm enough and now all I have are a reminders to be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: Eze S

customer_reviews.title: Too easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: Either my 15 month old is super strong, or these don’t stick as well as they claim. He was able to rip them off, even after letting them set for a day. Just one good tug from him, and boom, off they come. Are they soft and protective? Yes. Do they install easy? Very much so. Do they come off easily? Too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby-proofing sharp furniture corners.
customer_reviews.text: These took seconds (literally) to apply to our furniture and have been holding up fantastically. They blend in really nicely, stick well, and have definitely prevented our little one from impaling her face on the furniture (since she's now walking and prone to headbutting everything). These are far better than similar products I've tried in the past!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective protection
customer_reviews.text: These are very helpful for any tables with sharp corners. Our coffee table is at the perfect height for young kids to poke out an eye if they are running fast enough. These give me peace of mind. Adhesive is strong but can still be ripped off with a medium amount of force. The color is fairly accurate, it is much more flesh color than pure white.
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding protection
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these protectors four times. I don’t rebuy them because they keep falling off. In fact, these bumpers stay on as long as you want them too! I just have several areas in my home that have sharp edges. I also bought a couple sets for my in-laws as well since we have two toddler daughters. The 3M adhesive works great and my daughters have both smacked into them on a few occasions with no bodily damage done. Simply great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Baglio

customer_reviews.title: Bouncy and Thick
customer_reviews.text: We used these to protect our knee on the corner of our bed frame. It projects out a little bit and the metal hurts. These were a perfect solution. Very bouncy and thick. I wish they sold a smaller pack some we only needed two.
customer_reviews.author: Lzabethlzabeth

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: When I installed new metal cabinets on the walls of my garage, I found out the hard way how sharp the exposed corners are (ouch!). I ordered and installed the Soft Baby Proofing Corner Guards. They are soft yet still firm enough to protect the head. They even look good. It remains to be seen if the 3-M adhesive strips continue to hold in the heat of a So. Florida garage, so an update will follow if the product falls off the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT for the corners of the dangerous glass sink counter in my bathroom, which is right at the height of my 2-year-old’s forehead! Perfect amount of cushion. I feel completely assured that if she runs into the glass corner, she won’t get hurt. So easy and fast to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Essential for child safety
customer_reviews.text: I have two rambunctious toddlers who love to run around the house. We had one very close call with the corner of our granite island and had to buy something to protect the kids. Install was easy, they are staying in place but the only gripe i have is that I wish they were slightly longer. They only cover an inch to an inch and a half from the corner. If they covered 6 inches or so that would be a safer and better product.
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Prevents dogs from chewing the wood & surprisingly doesn’t look tacky!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these corners. I was worried the corners would look tacky on my nice coffee table, however they blend perfectly and look GREAT. I am pleasantly shocked. One of my dogs loves chewing any and all of my new furniture so I got these to prevent him from chewing and u know, it’s working perfect! Not only does he not have access to the wood anymore, but he hates the smell of them! I would highly recommend if your dog loves chewing your furniture too. They work!! So happy with this purchase. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie salas

customer_reviews.title: Practically no smell and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few of this type of corner guards and they had a bad chemical smell typical of items from China. However, these were clean and were also easy to install with the doublesided tape that came with them. If you want stronger adhesion, I would recomment buying an addional true 3M double sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: Max™

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing. I was worried since my coffee table doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I was worried since my coffee table doesn't have straight edges but the adhesive is so strong it sticks well enough to the edges it's touching. I'm only concerned about what it might do to the wood finish once removed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We had larger size bumpers like these but my 9 month old pulled them right off, we got them from Target. I decided to try again. So I ordered these and they're smaller than what we had before but they seem to stick better. My baby is now 11 months and she tried a couple times to pull them off with no luck. Maybe these stick better or she's just not as adament about pulling them off anymore. Been using them about a week or so and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqueline Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Protects Little Heads
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter is just beginning to try to walk and pulls up on everything. The coffee table corners are about "mouth high." They have done a good job of protecting her head and eyes. We cleaned the corners with alcohol before installing these corner guards and they are staying on well despite her efforts to chew them off. It will be interesting to see how well they can be removed when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Womer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Child's Forehead
customer_reviews.text: We put these on our dining room table on the underside corner. I hardly notice them anymore because they are so small. These really do protect kids against sharp corners. They stick on with double sided tape and even when my daughter tries to pull them off, they just stick back on. I have yet to have one fall off on it's own. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Table Corner Protectors Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I applied the table corner protectors to my dishwasher door as it has sharp edges. The corner protectors were easy to apply. Before I applied these corner protectors, I would occasionally scratch my legs on the corners of the dishwasher door = Ouch! Glad no more scratched legs!
customer_reviews.author: Marie W.

customer_reviews.title: Worst baby proofing pads
customer_reviews.text: If you want the proofing pads to stick longer, these are definitely not the ones you need. They are very easy to install and are very thick and will definitely protect the child if the bump the corner. But they have a very weak adhesion. Our LO removed all of them on her own within a few weeks of installation.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive is not that good on this one.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these before in other colors and liked them. They look nice on furniture especially when it blends well with the color but for some reason the sticky material on this one is bad. I did not have the issue with other colors. After one week the corners are already coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Kind of off white
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well on the beveled corners of my daughter's furniture. I bought some clear edge guards that popped right off, so I figured these might work better. These seem like they're a much better fit, and haven't come loose even with some hard blows. One nice thing about these is the double sided tape is already attached. The only downside is they're not a true white; they're slightly off white. Still better than the black ones we had though.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Bluth

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy again...
customer_reviews.text: These are only good for completely squared corners (so they don’t work with most things such as baseboards, dresser corners, etc). In addition, they aren’t very sticky once they are installed on corners that aren’t extremely crisp (corners that are more rounded). My 9 month old easily pulled all of them off the base boards within the first 24 hours. I wouldn’t buy them because they don’t stand up to a functional living space in the ground level. That being said, I’m sure they would work well for places that you worry about your child hitting who is eye level with counters and such.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and soft material
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these and only wish I found them SOONER! Squishy material makes them even better. Easy to apply and they dont look tacky on my furniture. I used them on my bed corners and the air conditioning unit outside because someone is always bumping into it. Would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. F.

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: We have had this on the corners of our furniture for a little over a year now and they have remained adhered. They are soft and do a great job of protecting our son who loves to run around the house. I cannot speak to ease of removal or any glue residue yet as we have not taken any off.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These were great for our wooden coffee table. They are easy to apply, and are super adhesive!!! My son liked to pick the gel ones off before and he can’t get these ones off. He’s even in that stage of chewing and it doesn’t tear into the material. I have not tried to remove them yet so I can’t answer to that.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: easy to install, made well.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Much cheaper than the same thing at Lowes. Used them on bed post corners, I was banging my chins on them. Much better now. Have not tried to remove them, do not know how easy they are to remove, don't really care. I don't want them to come off.
customer_reviews.author: Bmag

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and stays ON
customer_reviews.text: These corner guards are super easy to install. My toddler son keeps bumping into furniture but now I don’t have to worry about him getting nicked or getting hurt. The colour of the guards have actually gelled with my furniture colour. I haven’t removed any of these guards yet. I am hopeful they won’t ruin my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: R GUPTA

customer_reviews.title: Saved my knee's.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get them for baby safety i got them for the sharp corners of my bed. They are metal and cant be cut or smoothed over without causing damage to the bed frame. So simple easy solution put these on the corners cover with a bed spread and safety on. Great product and company, I recommend buying from here and as always Amazon is Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ormencres

customer_reviews.title: Safety First!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my preteen daughter who would always hit her knee on the corner of her bed frame. I ordered to send white as her bed frame as white so it wouldn't stand out. This has been a huge help to both her sanity as well as her well-being. Best purchase four corners.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great for overhead cabinets.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for overhead garage cabinets that are placed in the wrong area for a tall person’s head. No more banging my head on those things! These are padded well and stick well too. Easy to install with the pre-installed double sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: JVII

customer_reviews.title: Stay on and do the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after the much more expensive guards I got at local box store (and were only thing available) would not stay on. So far, these stay on and do the job. One thing I would note is that they were smaller than I expected based on earlier purchases of similar products, but overall this is not a problem for me: they do the job, and they are in no way small enough to be a choking hazard should they come off.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: softer abs more protective than other protective corners u have seen
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. These feel very cushiony/soft. We have wooden cat trees that have very sharp corners. A cat jumped and got cut by a corner. The corners for beautifully and stuck well. I wish more designers would think of using smoother edges because it is not just little children that can get injured. These soft corners can protect a human and I and Tschanz and other body parts from getting injured. I would buy these again for use in sharp corners
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ericson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used these to cover all the glass corners in my house. My 9 month old took a hit just the other night and these protectors saved her head. Nice and thick. Very squishy and they hold to the table perfectly. Bought 2 sets!
customer_reviews.author: Tameara

customer_reviews.title: Thick - High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Seem pretty high quality. Thicker than others we've seen. Not sure how long they'll stick, because the edges with the 3M double-stick tape aren't perfectly flat. But if they come off, I think some double-stick foam tape (which is a little thicker) should solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: pinmagic

customer_reviews.title: Saved my knee
customer_reviews.text: I tend to hit my knee a lot on the corner of my bed frame because there is not much space between my bed and dresser. This has saved my knees more than a few times. I gave 4 stars because it looks a little awkward because i had to adjust it a bit. But overall its a good product.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: stays on and holds up to abuse!
customer_reviews.text: We tried these after frustration with the clear corner guards by another brand as they kept coming off over and over when our baby would touch them. These not only stay on but hold up to our baby trying to pry them off and chomp them when she's teething. Our coffee table is brown so while noticeable the color is not as clashing.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Big help!
customer_reviews.text: I have a son with Cerebral Palsy and he has seizures, so this product works well with helping us protect him in the event he has one and accidentally bumps his head. It would be great if there was a longer version to fit over the rim of the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great Corner Guards
customer_reviews.text: These corner guards are great. Just what I was looking for. They are sturdy, but are easy to cut with a box cutter for a customized fit. I used them for a wainscoting molding to prevent my refrigerator door from hitting the hard corner edge of the molding.
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY T.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are durable yet so cheap! they have been a lifesaver.. literally. My son stumbled and hit his head of the corner of the table but this saved him from any injury, he didn’t even cry! Giving 4 stars only because on one of the tables I have them on they kept coming off after about 3 weeks and I had to super glue them on, but I think that was due to the table corners being rounded because they have stayed perfectly intact on my other table with more blunt corners.
customer_reviews.author: bre

customer_reviews.title: Work well when they stay on!
customer_reviews.text: These work well, when they stay on! The tape that comes with them stinks, so if you can find some heavy duty adhesive double sided tape that sticks better, they will be perfect! I just keep sticking them back on when they fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 boys

customer_reviews.title: Just wish we had found these years ago
customer_reviews.text: Excellent solution to sharp corners on bed frames, desks, laundry shelves, and other bruise-causing corners. The thick but cushy foam has already prevented a shin bruise from our bed frame. Good 3M adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: Kassey

customer_reviews.title: Adult proof your room
customer_reviews.text: I love these in my room I walk past my dresser and hit my arm all the time or my leg on my bed so I got these to keep from tearing my skin and bruising my legs Easy to put on whatever they’re sticky and Stretchy
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Guilford

customer_reviews.title: They don’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: Effective when they’re attached. Unfortunately the baby can rip it off pretty easily, and has done so with every corner guard I put on. One just fell off. The ones the kids ripped off damaged the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Khadija

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Safe
customer_reviews.text: This product was so easy to attach to the table. I have a small metal and glass table and toddlers that like to run. This fit perfectly on the corners of the small table and made is safe for the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for moving furniture!
customer_reviews.text: We used these to protect our furniture during a big move into a new house and it gave us peace of mind that our furniture was going to puncture other things or someone! Our furniture was moved with no scratches or dents!
customer_reviews.author: Amieel

customer_reviews.title: Protects pets and children, blends well with furniture
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to protect dog from hitting himself on edges of coffee table. I did not adhere since the corner guards slid on and stayed easily without using any adhesive. The color blend well with walnut finish and are barely noticeable. This is a wonderful invention.
customer_reviews.author: La Smurf

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, easy to put on, come off too easy.
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my TV stand since my daughter is now pulling herself up on everything and I didnt want her to hit the corners. They are super soft and would protect her head. The only negative thing is they do come off SUPER easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: As you get busy with life, you tend to ignore your surroundings more and more, so like me you tend to bump your noggin into things. If it has a point, OUCH! These corner bumpers are perfect for that purpose. I have added it to both our bathroom cabinet corners seeing as every time I bend over to replace the toilet paper I stand up and hit my head. They come in 2 colors, white and brown. It would be nice to see them come in various colors of brown to match more with cabinet colors.
customer_reviews.author: sharon wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Corners came off overnight
customer_reviews.text: I put the corners on at night & without being touched, they were on the floor in the morning. I don’t know about the strip yet.l, but they’re thin. I would say they’re ok if they stick. After the corner, I’m not counting on them staying on either
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something like this for a some time. I needed them on the corners of my platform bed as I keep hitting my shins as I walk around the bed. These went on very easily, seem to be very secure (so far) and have prevented any more painful bumps in the night! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: G Merithew

customer_reviews.title: Economical and functional
customer_reviews.text: I used them on the corners of an outdoor fire place. We use a grill cover to protect it and the cover was shredded at each corner this spring. I purchased a new cover and the corner guards to protect it. I put them on with masking tape and take them off prior to firing up the fire place.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H Henne

customer_reviews.title: Tried several products like this and this is the only one that worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried several products like this and this is the only one that worked and didn't just fall off!! So happy and grateful for this product!!! I had given up on corner guards, very happy to have given it one more try.
customer_reviews.author: Kaya B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install product and so far my daughter has been able to pick them off the corners even though she was able to remove all the adhesive edging that I had ordered from another company.
customer_reviews.author: sparkandbee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, soft and effective
customer_reviews.text: We installed them on some drawers that contained children's toys. Now my 10 month granddaughter can open the drawers, pull out toys and not hit her chin on the pointed upper corners or slam her fingers when she closes the drawer. The corner guards not only protect from bruises on the corners but the foam allows a soft close of the drawer which doesn't pinch her fingers. Recommended to my daughter for many applications around the house.
customer_reviews.author: RDH

customer_reviews.title: Made out of foam and larger than others is a plus.
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are made out of foam and they’re bigger than other options, I actually wish they made even larger ones because all these corner protectors don’t cover the entire corner edge. Either you cover the top or the bottom, and still part of the corner is left unprotected. So at least these ARE bigger than the usual. So far they’re still in place, they haven’t come off. So I am pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: Overall good, but be aware that they are small and doesn't have a thick layer of cushion. I had to buy another brand for tv stand and tables. These I kept for light cushions for air conditioners, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Runa

customer_reviews.title: Soft edge guards
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after my son almost hit his head on the edge of my in-laws counter while running so I ordered these ASAP and attached them the box comes with eight. There soft I haven’t had to remove them yet so I can’t say if they leave a mark.
customer_reviews.author: randy johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised. I used it to protect shin bones from being bruised by hitting them on the sharp corners of a platform bed. The color is perfect, the padding is thick, and they were so easy to stick on. They fit absolutely perfect. So glad I discovered them !
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ertel

product_meta.title: Soft Baby Proofing Corner Guards & Edge Protectors - Pre-Taped Table Corner Protector, Child Safety Furniture Bumper, Sharp Corner Cushions, 8 Pack, Brown
feature_bullets: ALWAYS KEEP YOUR CHILD SAFE! You love your baby more than anything, and you want to prevent head and knee injuries from sharp corners. That's why you'll love our Sure Basics Impact Absorbing Corner Protector.

QUICK INSTALLATION IN 1 MINUTE - Comes Pre-Taped - Install your table corner protectors for baby in seconds without any hassle! Simply peel back the tape backing, and place edge guard on the desired surface.

PEACE OF MIND PARENTING - Completely childproof the sharp edges and corners in your home without damaging your beautiful furniture. Our safe baby safety corner guards use long-lasting double sided adhesive tape that sticks on Wood, Glass, Steel, and Ceramic surfaces.

THE PERFECT GIFT FOR SMART MOMS! The best solution is always prevention! If you are looking for a thoughtful gift for parents and grandparents, then you have found a winner with our 8-Pack of baby corner guards! It's a gift that keeps on giving!

SAFETY PRECAUTIONS FOR THE WIN - Did you know sharp edges on tables, shelves, chairs, and furniture can cause nasty injuries for children? Now you can prevent unnecessary accidents while your child plays with our Extra-Cushioned furniture corner protectors! Click the yellow "Add to Cart" button today, and start enjoying greater safety in your home!
